alert.note: Alert for Hitchcock (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued August 25 at 3:29PM CDT until August 25 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM CDT FOR NORTHWESTERN HITCHCOCK COUNTY... At 329 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Palisade, or 11 miles southwest of Hayes Center, moving north at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters reported 55-60 mph winds in Palisade. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Palisade. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
